tooltip.biomancy.unveiling_oculi: Grants you peering sight, revealing the unseen to you. You can't be blinded by night nor magic.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_war_axe: A ornery Axe that has a 60% chance to cleave away 30% of its enemies max health when the wielders health is below 75% of the max health of the enemy.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_khopesh: A sickle sword which evolved from axes.
tooltip.biomancy.blood_curse_axe: An Axe which attacks faster the less health the wielder has.
tooltip.biomancy.leech_claw:
A close combat Claw that reduces the max-health of the the wielder and heals them by 10% of the damage dealt to their victim.

Additionally grants 15s of Absorption on critical hit, the effect potency can stack up to 5 times.
tooltip.biomancy.long_range_claw: A Fleshborn Claw with higher attack distance. Excite the Fleshborn with critical hits and it will extends its claws.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_guan_dao: A Fleshborn Guan Dao which features superior reach and adaptation. Striking the same target repeatedly with heavy attacks will increase the damage against it.
tooltip.biomancy.single_item_bag:
A Fleshborn that can store a large amount of a single item type.
It features Devouring behavior that will try to eat all items of the same type from the users inventory.
In Replenish mode the Fleshborn will try to fill up items in the main or off hand.
tooltip.biomancy.entity_storage: A Fleshborn that can store a single living Entity in its stomach.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_pickaxe: A Fleshborn Pickaxe that features 3x3 aoe harvest (sneak to disable) and adapts to the block they are harvesting.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_axe: A Fleshborn Axe that features 3x3 aoe harvest (sneak to disable) and adapts to the block they are harvesting.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_shovel: A Fleshborn Shovel that features 3x3 aoe harvest (sneak to disable) and adapts to the block they are harvesting.
tooltip.biomancy.oculus_key: Used to assign Users to ownable Blocks. To add Users, combine with a Blood Sample in a Crafting table.
tooltip.biomancy.injection_device:
Allows you to force inject Mobs or Blocks with reagents (some reagents can't be injected into everything).
Loaded/Unloaded via glass-vials/reagents in offhand and sneak clicking.
When empty it can extract blood from entities.
tooltip.biomancy.tooth_gun:
Shoots small teeth.
Uses nutrient paste to regrow ammo.
tooltip.biomancy.withershot:
Shoots small and deadly wither skulls. Restores the shooters health if the victim was killed.
Uses wither skulls to reload ammo.
tooltip.biomancy.boomling:
A placeable and living proximity trap. Once a target is acquired the boomling will leap at its victims and explode into an AOE Potion Effect.

Combine with a potion in crafting table to set the potion effect.
Sneak click to pick back up once placed.
tooltip.biomancy.reagent: Some kind of exotic substance affecting Mobs & Blocks once injected.
tooltip.biomancy.growth_serum: Induces growth, even for reeds, cactus & nether wart.
tooltip.biomancy.rejuvenation_serum: Reverses growth of Plants and Mobs.
tooltip.biomancy.breeding_stimulant: Forces Animals to be ready to mate.
tooltip.biomancy.insomnia_cure: Resets the last slept time, no need for sleep anymore...
tooltip.biomancy.cleansing_serum: Removes all potion effects, removes genetic material from flesh blobs.
tooltip.biomancy.decay_agent: Causes flesh eating disease and strongly affects zombies.
tooltip.biomancy.mutagen_serum: Induces mutations in flesh blobs and some other mobs (Villagers, Animals, Guardians).
tooltip.biomancy.blood_sample: Contains genetic material, inject a flesh blob with it with an two doses of mutagen.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_trapdoor:
Auto resets.
Sneak click to change mode.
tooltip.biomancy.fleshborn_pressure_plat:
Sneak click to change mode.
Able to activate ownable blocks.
tooltip.biomancy.gulge: A deep storage sac that stores up to 32k items of a single type and keeps it's inventory when mined.
tooltip.biomancy.chewer:
A bio-machine that crushes items into smaller parts by chewing them.
The bio-machine consumes nutrient slurry/paste/bars to function.
tooltip.biomancy.digester:
A bio-machine that consumes water to process biomass into nutrient slurry.
The bio-machine will pull biomass from the block it is attached to.
tooltip.biomancy.solidifier:
A gland like bio-machine that coagulates fluids into solid Items.
The bio-machine will pull fluid from the bock it is attached to.
tooltip.biomancy.decomposer:
A bio-machine that deconstructs items into their base components.
The bio-machine consumes nutrient slurry/paste/bars to function.
tooltip.biomancy.evolution_pool: A organic pool filled with mutagen that is used to craft organic items.
tooltip.biomancy.boomling_hive_gun: [WIP] Combine with potion in crafting Table. Uses Nutrient Paste to reload.
death.attack.biomancy.blight_thorn.item: %1$s was mauled to death by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.biomancy.ravenous_hunger: %1$s couldn't stop their ravenous hunger and consumed themselves
death.attack.biomancy.disease.player: %1$s was infected by an disease through %2$s and ultimately died
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile: %1$s was forcefully implanted with teeth by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile.i: %1$s received a lethal dental implant by %2$s using %3$s
advancements.biomancy.root.title: Biomancy
advancements.biomancy.flesh.title: Flesh Crafting
advancements.biomancy.flesh.description: Fill a cauldron with raw meats, some bone meal and a potion of healing
advancements.biomancy.stomach.title: Organic Food Converter?
advancements.biomancy.stomach.descriptio: Kill some animals or flesh blobs for a stomach
advancements.biomancy.digester.title: Organic Fuel Production
advancements.biomancy.digester.descripti: Craft a Digester in order to create fuel for other Bio-Machines
advancements.biomancy.chewer.title: Munch & Crunch
advancements.biomancy.chewer.description: Build a Chewer to crush things into a more edible size
advancements.biomancy.solidifier.title: Making things thick
advancements.biomancy.solidifier.descrip: Craft a Solidifier to coagulate fluids into solids
advancements.biomancy.decomposer.title: Deconstructing Things
advancements.biomancy.evolution_pool.des: Create a Evolution Pool by applying mutagenic bile to Flesh Stairs in a 2x2 well configuration
advancements.biomancy.biometal.title: Semi-Living Metal?
advancements.biomancy.biometal.descripti: Use a Evolution Pool to fuse dead metal with living flesh
advancements.biomancy.reagent.title: Is this Bio-Alchemy?
advancements.biomancy.reagent.descriptio: Combine secretions and substances in a Vial to create Reagents
advancements.biomancy.crushed_biomass.de: Preprocess biomass into crushed biomass by chewing it into a bolus
advancements.biomancy.nutrient_paste.des: Solidify Nutrient Slurry into a Paste
guide_book.biomancy.name: Vionomicon
guide_book.biomancy.landing_text:
